Summary Note:
The RM first met Heikkinen Järvinen Miettinen at a luxury car show in Helsinki. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
Heikkinen Järvinen Miettinen is a seasoned professional with over 18 years of experience.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.

Heikkinen obtained his secondary school diploma from Lappeenranta Lyceum in 2000.

Occupation History:
Heikkinen Järvinen Miettinen is a 42 year old Operations Director from Finland.
Heikkinen Järvinen Miettinen's first role was as a Plant Manager at Valmet Oyj, where he worked diligently from 2007 to 2011 to establish a strong reputation.
In 2013, he moved to Valmet Oyj to work as a Operations Director, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.

He managed to save approximately 110000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
